snippet: There are nearly two dozen contenders for best original screenplay.
abstract: There are nearly two dozen contenders for best original screenplay.
lead_paragraph: The conventional wisdom in Hollywood is that the only films to find surefire success at the box office are remakes and sequels, and this year has seen precious few exceptions. Buzzfeed helpfully ranks the top 15 original films, starting with the Oscar contender “Gravity” — the only original story in the Top 10 grosses of the year — and ending with another Oscar hopeful, “Prisoners” (the 50th-highest grosser).

headline.main: Tough Competition for Original Scripts (and Cover Songs)
